project_plan.name: Directory Monitoring Script in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a script that monitors a specified directory for new files and logs their names and creation times to a log file.

task.name: Set up directory monitoring to detect new files
Implement functionality to retrieve file name and creation time
Log the file name and creation time to a specified log file
Write unit tests for the directory monitoring functionality
Execute tests to verify that monitoring and logging functions correctly
